## memoru package

## Classes

<table><thead><tr><th>

Class

</th><th>

Description

</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[Memoru](./memoru.memoru.md)

</td><td>

Memoru is a high-performance LRU cache using a two-map hashlru algorithm. Supports any key type and can be rotated by size or memory threshold.

</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[MemoryStatsMonitor](./memoru.memorystatsmonitor.md)

</td><td>

Periodically monitors V8 and process memory stats, emitting events when thresholds are reached.

</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
